commands.name: Install Diffusers
commands.command: wsl -d ComfyUI-Ubuntu bash -c "cd /home/ComfyUI && source comfyui/bin/activate && python -m pip install diffusers --user"

commands.name: up diffusers
commands.command: wsl -d ComfyUI-Ubuntu bash -c "cd /home/ComfyUI && source comfyui/bin/activate && python -m pip install --upgrade diffusers"

commands.name: Install ControlNetPreprocessors
commands.command: wsl -d ComfyUI-Ubuntu bash -c "cd /home/ComfyUI && source comfyui/bin/activate && python -m pip install opencv-python"

commands.name: Install dghs-imgutils
commands.command: wsl -d ComfyUI-Ubuntu bash -c "cd /home/ComfyUI && source comfyui/bin/activate && python -m pip install dghs-imgutils[gpu] --user"

commands.name: Install ultralytics
commands.command: wsl -d ComfyUI-Ubuntu bash -c "cd /home/ComfyUI && source comfyui/bin/activate && python -m pip install ultralytics"

commands.name: Install sentencepiece
commands.command: wsl -d ComfyUI-Ubuntu bash -c "cd /home/ComfyUI && source comfyui/bin/activate && python -m pip install sentencepiece"

commands.name: Install pandas
commands.command: wsl -d ComfyUI-Ubuntu bash -c "cd /home/ComfyUI && source comfyui/bin/activate && python -m pip install pandas"

commands.name: install setuptools
commands.command: wsl -d ComfyUI-Ubuntu bash -c "cd /home/ComfyUI && source comfyui/bin/activate && python -m pip install setuptools"

commands.name: Install ImpactPack
commands.command: wsl -d ComfyUI-Ubuntu bash -c "cd /home/ComfyUI/custom_nodes/ComfyUI-Impact-Pack && source ../../comfyui/bin/activate && python -m pip install -r requirements.txt"

commands.name: install AnimateDiff
